65 // ******************************************************************************************
66 // Base class contructor
67 // ******************************************************************************************
68 PlanningSceneDisplay::PlanningSceneDisplay(bool listen_to_planning_scene, bool show_scene_robot)
69  : Display(), planning_scene_needs_render_(true), current_scene_time_(0.0f)
70 {
71  move_group_ns_property_ = new rviz::StringProperty("Move Group Namespace", "",
72  "The name of the ROS namespace in "
73  "which the move_group node is running",
74  this, SLOT(changedMoveGroupNS()), this);
75  robot_description_property_ =
76  new rviz::StringProperty("Robot Description", "robot_description",
77  "The name of the ROS parameter where the URDF for the robot is loaded", this,
78  SLOT(changedRobotDescription()), this);
79 
80  if (listen_to_planning_scene)
81  planning_scene_topic_property_ =
82  new rviz::RosTopicProperty("Planning Scene Topic", "move_group/monitored_planning_scene",
83  ros::message_traits::datatype<moveit_msgs::PlanningScene>(),
84  "The topic on which the moveit_msgs::PlanningScene messages are received", this,
85  SLOT(changedPlanningSceneTopic()), this);
86  else
87  planning_scene_topic_property_ = nullptr;
88 
89  // Planning scene category -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
90  scene_category_ = new rviz::Property("Scene Geometry", QVariant(), "", this);
91 
92  scene_name_property_ = new rviz::StringProperty("Scene Name", "(noname)", "Shows the name of the planning scene",
93  scene_category_, SLOT(changedSceneName()), this);
94  scene_name_property_->setShouldBeSaved(false);
95  scene_enabled_property_ =
96  new rviz::BoolProperty("Show Scene Geometry", true, "Indicates whether planning scenes should be displayed",
97  scene_category_, SLOT(changedSceneEnabled()), this);
98 
99  scene_alpha_property_ = new rviz::FloatProperty("Scene Alpha", 0.9f, "Specifies the alpha for the scene geometry",
100  scene_category_, SLOT(changedSceneAlpha()), this);
101  scene_alpha_property_->setMin(0.0);
102  scene_alpha_property_->setMax(1.0);
103 
104  scene_color_property_ =
105  new rviz::ColorProperty("Scene Color", QColor(50, 230, 50),
106  "The color for the planning scene obstacles (if a color is not defined)", scene_category_,
107  SLOT(changedSceneColor()), this);
108 
109  octree_render_property_ = new rviz::EnumProperty("Voxel Rendering", "Occupied Voxels", "Select voxel type.",
110  scene_category_, SLOT(changedOctreeRenderMode()), this);
111 
112  octree_render_property_->addOption("Occupied Voxels", OCTOMAP_OCCUPIED_VOXELS);
113  octree_render_property_->addOption("Free Voxels", OCTOMAP_FREE_VOXELS);
114  octree_render_property_->addOption("All Voxels", OCTOMAP_FREE_VOXELS | OCTOMAP_OCCUPIED_VOXELS);
115 
116  octree_coloring_property_ = new rviz::EnumProperty("Voxel Coloring", "Z-Axis", "Select voxel coloring mode",
117  scene_category_, SLOT(changedOctreeColorMode()), this);
118 
119  octree_coloring_property_->addOption("Z-Axis", OCTOMAP_Z_AXIS_COLOR);
120  octree_coloring_property_->addOption("Cell Probability", OCTOMAP_PROBABLILTY_COLOR);
121 
122  scene_display_time_property_ = new rviz::FloatProperty("Scene Display Time", 0.01f,
123  "The amount of wall-time to wait in between rendering "
124  "updates to the planning scene (if any)",
125  scene_category_, SLOT(changedSceneDisplayTime()), this);
126  scene_display_time_property_->setMin(0.0001);
127 
128  if (show_scene_robot)
129  {
130  robot_category_ = new rviz::Property("Scene Robot", QVariant(), "", this);
131 
132  scene_robot_visual_enabled_property_ =
133  new rviz::BoolProperty("Show Robot Visual", true,
134  "Indicates whether the robot state specified by the planning scene should be "
135  "displayed as defined for visualisation purposes.",
136  robot_category_, SLOT(changedSceneRobotVisualEnabled()), this);
137 
138  scene_robot_collision_enabled_property_ =
139  new rviz::BoolProperty("Show Robot Collision", false,
140  "Indicates whether the robot state specified by the planning scene should be "
141  "displayed as defined for collision detection purposes.",
142  robot_category_, SLOT(changedSceneRobotCollisionEnabled()), this);
143 
144  robot_alpha_property_ = new rviz::FloatProperty("Robot Alpha", 1.0f, "Specifies the alpha for the robot links",
145  robot_category_, SLOT(changedRobotSceneAlpha()), this);
146  robot_alpha_property_->setMin(0.0);
147  robot_alpha_property_->setMax(1.0);
148 
149  attached_body_color_property_ =
150  new rviz::ColorProperty("Attached Body Color", QColor(150, 50, 150), "The color for the attached bodies",
151  robot_category_, SLOT(changedAttachedBodyColor()), this);
152  }
153  else
154  {
155  robot_category_ = nullptr;
156  scene_robot_visual_enabled_property_ = nullptr;
157  scene_robot_collision_enabled_property_ = nullptr;
158  robot_alpha_property_ = nullptr;
159  attached_body_color_property_ = nullptr;
160  }
161 }
162 
163 // ******************************************************************************************
164 // Deconstructor
165 // ******************************************************************************************
166 PlanningSceneDisplay::~PlanningSceneDisplay()
167 {
168  clearJobs();
169 
170  planning_scene_render_.reset();
171  if (context_ && context_->getSceneManager() && planning_scene_node_)
172  context_->getSceneManager()->destroySceneNode(planning_scene_node_);
173  if (planning_scene_robot_)
174  planning_scene_robot_.reset();
175  planning_scene_monitor_.reset();
176 }
177 
178 void PlanningSceneDisplay::clearJobs()
179 {
180  background_process_.clear();
181  {
182  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(main_loop_jobs_lock_);
183  main_loop_jobs_.clear();
184  }
185 }
186 
187 void PlanningSceneDisplay::onInitialize()
188 {
189  Display::onInitialize();
190 
191  // the scene node that contains everything and is located at the planning frame
192  planning_scene_node_ = scene_node_->createChildSceneNode();
193 
194  if (robot_category_)
195  {
196  planning_scene_robot_.reset(
197  new RobotStateVisualization(planning_scene_node_, context_, "Planning Scene", robot_category_));
198  planning_scene_robot_->setVisible(true);
199  planning_scene_robot_->setVisualVisible(scene_robot_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
200  planning_scene_robot_->setCollisionVisible(scene_robot_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
201  changedRobotSceneAlpha();
202  changedAttachedBodyColor();
203  }
204 }
205 
206 void PlanningSceneDisplay::reset()
207 {
208  if (planning_scene_robot_)
209  planning_scene_robot_->clear();
210  Display::reset();
211 
212  if (isEnabled())
213  addBackgroundJob(boost::bind(&PlanningSceneDisplay::loadRobotModel, this), "loadRobotModel");
214 
215  if (planning_scene_robot_)
216  {
217  planning_scene_robot_->setVisible(true);
218  planning_scene_robot_->setVisualVisible(scene_robot_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
219  planning_scene_robot_->setCollisionVisible(scene_robot_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
220  }
221 }
222 
223 void PlanningSceneDisplay::addBackgroundJob(const boost::function<void()>& job, const std::string& name)
224 {
225  background_process_.addJob(job, name);
226 }
227 
228 void PlanningSceneDisplay::spawnBackgroundJob(const boost::function<void()>& job)
229 {
230  boost::thread t(job);
231 }
232 
233 void PlanningSceneDisplay::addMainLoopJob(const boost::function<void()>& job)
234 {
235  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(main_loop_jobs_lock_);
236  main_loop_jobs_.push_back(job);
237 }
238 
239 void PlanningSceneDisplay::waitForAllMainLoopJobs()
240 {
241  boost::unique_lock<boost::mutex> ulock(main_loop_jobs_lock_);
242  while (!main_loop_jobs_.empty())
243  main_loop_jobs_empty_condition_.wait(ulock);
244 }
245 
246 void PlanningSceneDisplay::executeMainLoopJobs()
247 {
248  main_loop_jobs_lock_.lock();
249  while (!main_loop_jobs_.empty())
250  {
251  boost::function<void()> fn = main_loop_jobs_.front();
252  main_loop_jobs_.pop_front();
253  main_loop_jobs_lock_.unlock();
254  try
255  {
256  fn();
257  }
258  catch (std::exception& ex)
259  {
260  ROS_ERROR("Exception caught executing main loop job: %s", ex.what());
261  }
262  main_loop_jobs_lock_.lock();
263  }
264  main_loop_jobs_empty_condition_.notify_all();
265  main_loop_jobs_lock_.unlock();
266 }
267 
268 const planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr& PlanningSceneDisplay::getPlanningSceneMonitor()
269 {
270  return planning_scene_monitor_;
271 }
272 
273 const std::string PlanningSceneDisplay::getMoveGroupNS() const
274 {
275  return move_group_ns_property_->getStdString();
276 }
277 
278 const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& PlanningSceneDisplay::getRobotModel() const
279 {
280  if (planning_scene_monitor_)
281  return planning_scene_monitor_->getRobotModel();
282  else
283  {
284  static moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr empty;
285  return empty;
286  }
287 }
288 
289 bool PlanningSceneDisplay::waitForCurrentRobotState(const ros::Time& t)
290 {
291  if (planning_scene_monitor_)
292  return planning_scene_monitor_->waitForCurrentRobotState(t);
293  return false;
294 }

296 planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO PlanningSceneDisplay::getPlanningSceneRO() const
297 {
298  return planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO(planning_scene_monitor_);
299 }

301 planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW PlanningSceneDisplay::getPlanningSceneRW()
302 {
303  return planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW(planning_scene_monitor_);
304 }

306 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedAttachedBodyColor()
307 {
308  queueRenderSceneGeometry();
309 }
310 
311 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedSceneColor()
312 {
313  queueRenderSceneGeometry();
314 }
315 
316 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedMoveGroupNS()
317 {
318  if (isEnabled())
319  reset();
320 }
321 
322 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedRobotDescription()
323 {
324  if (isEnabled())
325  reset();
326 }
327 
328 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedSceneName()
329 {
330  planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRW ps = getPlanningSceneRW();
331  if (ps)
332  ps->setName(scene_name_property_->getStdString());
333 }
334 
335 void PlanningSceneDisplay::renderPlanningScene()
336 {
337  QColor color = scene_color_property_->getColor();
338  rviz::Color env_color(color.redF(), color.greenF(), color.blueF());
339  if (attached_body_color_property_)
340  color = attached_body_color_property_->getColor();
341  rviz::Color attached_color(color.redF(), color.greenF(), color.blueF());
342 
343  try
344  {
345  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = getPlanningSceneRO();
346  if (planning_scene_needs_render_)
347  {
348  planning_scene_render_->renderPlanningScene(
349  ps, env_color, attached_color, static_cast<OctreeVoxelRenderMode>(octree_render_property_->getOptionInt()),
350  static_cast<OctreeVoxelColorMode>(octree_coloring_property_->getOptionInt()),
351  scene_alpha_property_->getFloat());
352  }
353  else
354  {
355  planning_scene_render_->updateRobotPosition(ps);
356  }
357  }
358  catch (std::exception& ex)
359  {
360  ROS_ERROR("Caught %s while rendering planning scene", ex.what());
361  }
362  planning_scene_render_->getGeometryNode()->setVisible(scene_enabled_property_->getBool());
363 }
364 
365 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedSceneAlpha()
366 {
367  queueRenderSceneGeometry();
368 }
369 
370 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedRobotSceneAlpha()
371 {
372  if (planning_scene_robot_)
373  {
374  planning_scene_robot_->setAlpha(robot_alpha_property_->getFloat());
375  queueRenderSceneGeometry();
376  }
377 }
378 
379 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedPlanningSceneTopic()
380 {
381  if (planning_scene_monitor_ && planning_scene_topic_property_)
382  {
383  planning_scene_monitor_->startSceneMonitor(planning_scene_topic_property_->getStdString());
384  std::string service_name = planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitor::DEFAULT_PLANNING_SCENE_SERVICE;
385  if (!getMoveGroupNS().empty())
386  service_name = ros::names::append(getMoveGroupNS(), service_name);
387  auto bg_func = [=]() {
388  if (planning_scene_monitor_->requestPlanningSceneState(service_name))
389  addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&PlanningSceneDisplay::onNewPlanningSceneState, this));
390  else
391  setStatus(rviz::StatusProperty::Warn, "PlanningScene", "Requesting initial scene failed");
392  };
393  addBackgroundJob(bg_func, "requestPlanningSceneState");
394  }
395 }
396 
397 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedSceneDisplayTime()
398 {
399 }

401 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedOctreeRenderMode()
402 {
403 }

405 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedOctreeColorMode()

407 }

409 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedSceneRobotVisualEnabled()
410 {
411  if (isEnabled() && planning_scene_robot_)
412  {
413  planning_scene_robot_->setVisible(true);
414  planning_scene_robot_->setVisualVisible(scene_robot_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
415  planning_scene_needs_render_ = true;
416  }
417 }
418 
419 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedSceneRobotCollisionEnabled()
420 {
421  if (isEnabled() && planning_scene_robot_)
422  {
423  planning_scene_robot_->setVisible(true);
424  planning_scene_robot_->setCollisionVisible(scene_robot_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
425  planning_scene_needs_render_ = true;
426  }
427 }
428 
429 void PlanningSceneDisplay::changedSceneEnabled()
430 {
431  if (planning_scene_render_)
432  planning_scene_render_->getGeometryNode()->setVisible(scene_enabled_property_->getBool());
433 }
434 
435 void PlanningSceneDisplay::setGroupColor(rviz::Robot* robot, const std::string& group_name, const QColor& color)
436 {
437  if (getRobotModel())
438  {
439  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = getRobotModel()->getJointModelGroup(group_name);
440  if (jmg)
441  {
442  const std::vector<std::string>& links = jmg->getLinkModelNamesWithCollisionGeometry();
443  for (const std::string& link : links)
444  setLinkColor(robot, link, color);
445  }
446  }
447 }
448 
449 void PlanningSceneDisplay::unsetAllColors(rviz::Robot* robot)
450 {
451  if (getRobotModel())
452  {
453  const std::vector<std::string>& links = getRobotModel()->getLinkModelNamesWithCollisionGeometry();
454  for (const std::string& link : links)
455  unsetLinkColor(robot, link);
456  }
457 }
458 
459 void PlanningSceneDisplay::unsetGroupColor(rviz::Robot* robot, const std::string& group_name)
460 {
461  if (getRobotModel())
462  {
463  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = getRobotModel()->getJointModelGroup(group_name);
464  if (jmg)
465  {
466  const std::vector<std::string>& links = jmg->getLinkModelNamesWithCollisionGeometry();
467  for (const std::string& link : links)
468  unsetLinkColor(robot, link);
469  }
470  }
471 }
472 
473 void PlanningSceneDisplay::setLinkColor(const std::string& link_name, const QColor& color)
474 {
475  if (planning_scene_robot_)
476  setLinkColor(&planning_scene_robot_->getRobot(), link_name, color);
477 }
478 
479 void PlanningSceneDisplay::unsetLinkColor(const std::string& link_name)
480 {
481  if (planning_scene_robot_)
482  unsetLinkColor(&planning_scene_robot_->getRobot(), link_name);
483 }
484 
485 void PlanningSceneDisplay::setLinkColor(rviz::Robot* robot, const std::string& link_name, const QColor& color)
486 {
487  rviz::RobotLink* link = robot->getLink(link_name);
488 
489  // Check if link exists
490  if (link)
491  link->setColor(color.redF(), color.greenF(), color.blueF());
492 }
493 
494 void PlanningSceneDisplay::unsetLinkColor(rviz::Robot* robot, const std::string& link_name)
495 {
496  rviz::RobotLink* link = robot->getLink(link_name);
497 
498  // Check if link exists
499  if (link)
500  link->unsetColor();
501 }
502 
503 // ******************************************************************************************
504 // Load
505 // ******************************************************************************************
506 planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr PlanningSceneDisplay::createPlanningSceneMonitor()
507 {
508 #ifdef RVIZ_TF1
509  std::shared_ptr<tf2_ros::Buffer> tf_buffer = moveit::planning_interface::getSharedTF();
510 #else
511  std::shared_ptr<tf2_ros::Buffer> tf_buffer = context_->getFrameManager()->getTF2BufferPtr();
512 #endif
513  return std::make_shared<planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitor>(
514  robot_description_property_->getStdString(), tf_buffer, getNameStd() + "_planning_scene_monitor");
515 }
516 
517 void PlanningSceneDisplay::clearRobotModel()
518 {
519  planning_scene_render_.reset();
520  planning_scene_monitor_.reset(); // this so that the destructor of the PlanningSceneMonitor gets called before a new
521  // instance of a scene monitor is constructed
522 }
523 
524 void PlanningSceneDisplay::loadRobotModel()
525 {
526  // wait for other robot loadRobotModel() calls to complete;
527  boost::mutex::scoped_lock _(robot_model_loading_lock_);
528 
529  // we need to make sure the clearing of the robot model is in the main thread,
530  // so that rendering operations do not have data removed from underneath,
531  // so the next function is executed in the main loop
532  addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&PlanningSceneDisplay::clearRobotModel, this));
533 
534  waitForAllMainLoopJobs();
535 
536  planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitorPtr psm = createPlanningSceneMonitor();
537  if (psm->getPlanningScene())
538  {
539  planning_scene_monitor_.swap(psm);
540  planning_scene_monitor_->addUpdateCallback(boost::bind(&PlanningSceneDisplay::sceneMonitorReceivedUpdate, this, _1));
541  addMainLoopJob(boost::bind(&PlanningSceneDisplay::onRobotModelLoaded, this));
542  waitForAllMainLoopJobs();
543  }
544  else
545  {
546  addMainLoopJob([this]() { setStatus(rviz::StatusProperty::Error, "PlanningScene", "No Planning Scene Loaded"); });
547  }
548 }
549 
550 // This should always run in the main GUI thread!
551 void PlanningSceneDisplay::onRobotModelLoaded()
552 {
553  changedPlanningSceneTopic();
554  planning_scene_render_ = std::make_shared<PlanningSceneRender>(planning_scene_node_, context_, planning_scene_robot_);
555  planning_scene_render_->getGeometryNode()->setVisible(scene_enabled_property_->getBool());
556 
557  const planning_scene_monitor::LockedPlanningSceneRO& ps = getPlanningSceneRO();
558  if (planning_scene_robot_)
559  {
560  planning_scene_robot_->load(*getRobotModel()->getURDF());
561  moveit::core::RobotState* rs = new moveit::core::RobotState(ps->getCurrentState());
562  rs->update();
563  planning_scene_robot_->update(moveit::core::RobotStateConstPtr(rs));
564  }
565 
566  bool old_state = scene_name_property_->blockSignals(true);
567  scene_name_property_->setStdString(ps->getName());
568  scene_name_property_->blockSignals(old_state);
569 
570  setStatus(rviz::StatusProperty::Ok, "PlanningScene", "Planning Scene Loaded Successfully");
571 }
572 
573 void PlanningSceneDisplay::onNewPlanningSceneState()
574 {
575 }
576 
577 void PlanningSceneDisplay::sceneMonitorReceivedUpdate(
578  planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitor::SceneUpdateType update_type)
579 {
580  onSceneMonitorReceivedUpdate(update_type);
581 }
582 
583 void PlanningSceneDisplay::onSceneMonitorReceivedUpdate(
584  planning_scene_monitor::PlanningSceneMonitor::SceneUpdateType /*update_type*/)
585 {
586  getPlanningSceneRW()->getCurrentStateNonConst().update();
587  QMetaObject::invokeMethod(this, "setSceneName", Qt::QueuedConnection,
588  Q_ARG(QString, QString::fromStdString(getPlanningSceneRO()->getName())));
589  planning_scene_needs_render_ = true;
590 }
591 
592 void PlanningSceneDisplay::setSceneName(const QString& name)
593 {
594  scene_name_property_->setString(name);
595 }
596 
597 void PlanningSceneDisplay::onEnable()
598 {
599  Display::onEnable();
600 
601  addBackgroundJob(boost::bind(&PlanningSceneDisplay::loadRobotModel, this), "loadRobotModel");
602 
603  if (planning_scene_robot_)
604  {
605  planning_scene_robot_->setVisible(true);
606  planning_scene_robot_->setVisualVisible(scene_robot_visual_enabled_property_->getBool());
607  planning_scene_robot_->setCollisionVisible(scene_robot_collision_enabled_property_->getBool());
608  }
609  if (planning_scene_render_)
610  planning_scene_render_->getGeometryNode()->setVisible(scene_enabled_property_->getBool());
611 
612  calculateOffsetPosition();
613  planning_scene_needs_render_ = true;
614 }
615 
616 // ******************************************************************************************
617 // Disable
618 // ******************************************************************************************
619 void PlanningSceneDisplay::onDisable()
620 {
621  if (planning_scene_monitor_)
622  {
623  planning_scene_monitor_->stopSceneMonitor();
624  if (planning_scene_render_)
625  planning_scene_render_->getGeometryNode()->setVisible(false);
626  }
627  if (planning_scene_robot_)
628  planning_scene_robot_->setVisible(false);
629  Display::onDisable();
630 }
631 
632 void PlanningSceneDisplay::queueRenderSceneGeometry()
633 {
634  planning_scene_needs_render_ = true;
635 }
636 
637 void PlanningSceneDisplay::update(float wall_dt, float ros_dt)
638 {
639  Display::update(wall_dt, ros_dt);
640 
641  executeMainLoopJobs();
642 
643  calculateOffsetPosition();
644 
645  if (planning_scene_monitor_)
646  updateInternal(wall_dt, ros_dt);
647 }
648 
649 void PlanningSceneDisplay::updateInternal(float wall_dt, float /*ros_dt*/)
650 {
651  current_scene_time_ += wall_dt;
652  if (planning_scene_render_ &&
653  ((current_scene_time_ > scene_display_time_property_->getFloat() && robot_state_needs_render_) ||
654  planning_scene_needs_render_))
655  {
656  renderPlanningScene();
657  current_scene_time_ = 0.0f;
658  robot_state_needs_render_ = false;
659  planning_scene_needs_render_ = false;
660  }
661 }
662 
663 void PlanningSceneDisplay::load(const rviz::Config& config)
664 {
665  Display::load(config);
666 }
667 
668 void PlanningSceneDisplay::save(rviz::Config config) const
669 {
670  Display::save(config);
671 }
672 
673 // ******************************************************************************************
674 // Calculate Offset Position
675 // ******************************************************************************************
676 void PlanningSceneDisplay::calculateOffsetPosition()
677 {
678  if (!getRobotModel())
679  return;
680 
681  Ogre::Vector3 position;
682  Ogre::Quaternion orientation;
683 
684  context_->getFrameManager()->getTransform(getRobotModel()->getModelFrame(), ros::Time(0), position, orientation);
685 
686  planning_scene_node_->setPosition(position);
687  planning_scene_node_->setOrientation(orientation);
688 }
689 
690 void PlanningSceneDisplay::fixedFrameChanged()
691 {
692  Display::fixedFrameChanged();
693  calculateOffsetPosition();
694 }
695 
696 } // namespace moveit_rviz_plugin
